routinesteps.title: WASH HANDS
routinesteps.body: Put soap on your palms and wash hands for atleast 30 seconds

routinesteps.title: CLEANSE
routinesteps.body: Put your cleanser in your palms and massage face for atleast 60 secs

routinesteps.title: TONE
routinesteps.body: Put your toner in your palms and massage face for atleast 60 secs

routinesteps.title: SERUM
routinesteps.body: Put your serum in your palms and massage face for atleast 60 secs

routinesteps.title: MOISTURIZE
routinesteps.body: Put your moisturizer in your palms and massage face for atleast 60 secs

routinesteps.title: OIL CLEANSE
routinesteps.body: Add a dime size of your oil cleanser and rub in your palm to warm it up and massage your face for 60 seconds atleast.

routinesteps.title: OIL CLEANSING
routinesteps.body: Add a dime size of your favourite oil cleanser to your palm rub the palms to warm it up and use that to massage the face for atleast 60 seconds once a week.
